Clinical: Anaemia. Bones, affections of. Spleen, affections of.
Characteristics: The bones of young animals fed on Madder become tinged red. Burnett has found Rub. t. an excellent remedy (in ten-drop doses of the O) in anaemia and under-nourished conditions, especially in splenic anaemia.
Relations: Compare: Chin., Coff., Galium (bot.). In anaemia, Ferr.
